alert.note: Alert for Ashley (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued January 02 at 6:27PM CST until January 02 at 7:30PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Western Ashley County in southeastern Arkansas... Northwestern Morehouse Parish in northeastern Louisiana... * Until 730 PM CST. * At 626 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 12 miles north of Sterlington, or 13 miles northwest of Bastrop, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Crossett around 655 PM CST. North Crossett around 700 PM CST. Berlin around 705 PM CST. Hamburg around 715 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Blanchton. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
